skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.Reinforce
skill.description: For an agent , to enact the decision of reinforce a unit that can be reinforced. The reinforcement of an 'reinforceable' unit makes it enhanced with agent's physical capabilities. The 'entity' given as parameter is reinforced until this action is no longer triggered.

feedback.name: reinforcementActionRunning
feedback.description: Executed upon action completion (agent is reinforcing the target entity).
